body: I would like to be a GM because I have no GM experience and I enjoy this guild very much :)

title: Could I be a GM please?  I have a lot of knowledge about the Natural Law and moral philosophy.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Of course everyone downvotes you. Unfortunately unless you're asking me or WRD (on reddit) pretty much the only way to become a mod of anything is to be friends with someone who's currently a mod. Even when they do "applications" most times they just disregard the ones they don't know, unless they're extremely desperate. People like having an elite, gated ruling class I suppose. It's the reason they idolate.

guild.description: This is a showcase of the moral decay, spiritual vapidity and general degeneracy in all its forms running rampant over what passes for contemporary Western society. Unlike the past Reddit iteration, you are more than welcome - encouraged, even - to interact with linked content and make your disdain known; passive acceptance is what got us into this mess and should be actively scorned in all things.
